Release Notes:

A coward dies only once
But a Space Hero dies a thousand deaths!
Help Hap Hazard, of the Elite Space Corps save Space Station Icarus from the
nefarious Otto Oblivion!

Inspired by the 1980&#039;s game Jumpman, Hap Hazard challenges you to dash through
dozens of unique levels, each filled with traps, tricks, and bombs set by the
evil cyber-mastermind, Otto Oblivion! Since Space Corps members can be
resurrected indefinitely, the only thing stopping you is Otto&#039;s time bomb!
But all is not lost-- if you commit acts of bravery or suicidal insanity
time itself will turn in your favor!

If you enjoy retro-style platformer action, give Hap Hazard a try! Grab your
keyboard or joystick and jump, dodge, slide, climb, and shoot your way to
space victory!

Features:

Forty levels, each one unique!
Complete quests to win space medals!
Full joystick and keyboard support!
Great music and animation!
Play time trials, special quest challenges, and more!

Installation:

1) Unzip, Unrar
2) Install the game
3) Copy the cracked file from the included crack.rar to the game dir
4) Run the game!
